## Useful Info

**Blizzard demons** are cold- and air-themed [tier-2 demons](/Tier-2_demon "Tier-2 demon"). Although less dangerous than [hellions](/Hellion "Hellion") or [cacodemons](/Cacodemon "Cacodemon"), they can still deal significant [cold](/Cold "Cold") and [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage to characters without the proper resistances. They can be found in the [Ice cave](/Ice_cave "Ice cave"), [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), and [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") (particularly in [Lom Lobon](/Lom_Lobon "Lom Lobon")'s domain).

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                           |                                                      |

| Slot1       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d18) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") (2d22) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike") (2d(11-27))           | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") (3d21)       | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Blizzard demons aren't too terrifying on their own - by the time they start appearing naturally, you'll likely have the proper resistances and high enough [AC](/AC "AC") to mitigate the damage output of their spells. Even so, allowing them to hang out around in the background while you deal with other opponents is dangerous; repeated [Airstrikes](/Airstrike "Airstrike") can rack up heavy damage over time. Try to keep them out of your line of sight if you can't deal with them immediately, particularly if you're at risk of getting [tormented](/Torment "Torment") as well.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), blizzard demons could be found in [Cocytus](/Cocytus "Cocytus").
- Blizzard demons were added in [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), replacing [Blue Deaths](/Blue_Death "Blue Death").
